column1: Smoque BBQ////Dang. That's five star barbecue. I mean
column3: that was good. My buddy and I sat down to what looked like an immensity of meat
column4: and plowed through like it was nothing. I usually don't eat beef
column5: but that brisket was some of the best beef I have tasted. It wasn't exactly a blur
column6: but it went down so fast and easy and good.
